content:
During the last night attack on Kiev, the X-101 missile was beaten from the Browning machine gun. In total, the defense forces destroyed 31 Russian rocket - 2 ballistic and 29 winged.

In the Avdeevsky direction, the 47th brigade destroyed the invaders who tried to hide in the cellar. In the same direction, the third assault brigade with the help of FPV-punks broke the position of the enemy in landing and hit the Russians who tried to escape. The junior lieutenant Anastasia Blyshchyk-Presenter of the 47th OMBR, will tell more about the situation in the Avdeevsky direction in the inclusion.

In the Liman direction, the Russians were again threw on the storm, but ... burned-the frames of reflection of the attack from the 60th separate mechanized Ingulets brigade. Meanwhile, the 92nd OSHBI showed how the occupier drowned his APC, the other Better fell into the ravine, where he crushed the Russian assault.

The Bureviy Brigade fighters shared the staff of raising the national flag in the Serebryansky Forestry. The SBU detained a traitor who spied on the security service staff and adjusted strokes in Zaporozhye, and the Russians tried to fight the shovels.

These and other topics are discussed by our presenters - junior lieutenant Sergei Lipko and Lieutenant Colonel Sergei Misyura.
title: Night Rocket Attack, the 47th Brigade buried the invaders, Rusnya drowned the APC: a stream from the frontier city
description: In the Avdeevsky direction, the 47th brigade destroyed the invaders who tried to hide ...
author: Army Inform
